title: Sona and Janna should have a "Cosmetic Buff" like Ahri's.
body:
Few month ago, Ahri received what Riot called a "Cosmetic buff", which improved her tails movements to be smoother, more realistic, its' the same Tech Riot used to animate Aurelion Sol's tail. Since this "upgrade", only Pool Party Fiora got a similar use of the tech with her giggling sword but I think that some champions would need this to look a little bit more realistic in game and less "blocked" on some points.
I think a lot about {{champion:37}} 's "scarfs" and hairs, which don't have a natural movement and feel very unsatisfying to watch. Same goes for {{champion:40}} hairs and "scarfs".

[Here](http://www.lolking.net/models) is the link for LOLKING's model viewer so you can see the animations by yourself.

What do you think about this?

replies.body: I think Janna just needs another VU and new voice lines. She looks very dated, being one of the original reworks, just like Kayle and Morgana, who also need new VUs.
she looks a lot better then she did before her visual rework that she already had
Aye but compare her flowing hair to Taric and see what she could become with another update.

If they did I'd want them to take another look at her overall design too. it's not really air elemental so much as, pretty girl, few clothes, she floats. they could also spice up her animations a lot to make her look less... boring, at what she does.

I wish she looked more ethereal
shes not a elemental shes a mage that was born in zaun
Then there's Udyr...
Can we just all give a moment of silence for how horrible {{champion:56}} model is. Like wtf is that 2d tail my eye plssss

I feel like he needs a full visual rework, I hate all of his skins including Eternum. He's in my top 3 champions and I always go with the default skin because it looks the least bad to me.

I have similar feelings toward Karma, except her problem is that her default skin is so good that it makes any but Lotus look bad in comparison.

_only Pool Party Fiora got a similar use of the tech with his giggling sword _

I..  What?
Pool party Fiora's sword is a foam noodle (I don't know the name for it) that giggle when she moves or uses a basic attack ^^

*jiggle.

Giggle is a form of laughter.

{{champion:114}} "ON GUARD!"
Sword: "HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!"
You also called Fiora a he. Kappa

Tbh I don't even mind not getting a new champ for a while if Riot just put effort into doing visual and voiceover updates for like a third of the roster. At least new voiceovers. Each new champion has pages of dialogue and awesome taunts and then there's like Zilean or Fiddle or WW who have like a dozen lines total.

Sona dont have that many lines either. Not counting music lines (taunts/jokes/etcetera) she only has 15 actual lines. 

I mean granted she IS mute but still.

There are a lot of old champs who could really do with a new VO
*cough*Amumu*cough*
Ahri tails were done as a side project by a rioter so i doubt it is something riot really prioritizes.
{{champion:268}}  and {{champion:127}}  were also done so it isnt out of the question
I think it was to prep the mechanic for Aurelion Sol.
I think they gave the cosmetic buff to Lissandra's hair too. But I do agree that they should at least give one for Sona's hair.
Have you seen {{champion:127}} veil/hair (whatever the hell it is)? lol it all moves together with 0 flow to it at all.
actually they changed that months ago...

I agree! Here's a list of all the champs that I think could make use of it (not previously stated in the thread): 

{{champion:69}} 
{{champion:267}} 
{{champion:143}} This is actually because she has very long hair and Lissandra got that treatment before Ahri because of her hair
{{champion:58}} His tail is small, but could def be a nice change.
{{champion:421}} 
{{champion:22}} {{champion:67}} These two have very long capes, but as they're more 2d than 3d it may not be worth to code. Vayne's hair my need it as well.
{{champion:31}} Again, the little tail.
{{champion:96}} Prolly not even worth doing with the tiny tail
{{champion:76}} Cougar form tail
{{champion:28}} Her little flowing things are basically the same as Janna's.
{{champion:84}} Long ponytail.
{{champion:131}} Guess what? Long hair.
Also a note:
I know I have a lot of champions in here because of hair. Believe it or not, I played Lissandra before and after the change, and it was a very nice and noticeable touch. 
Another note: 
I'm pretty sure they tested this mechanic on Liss then Ahri to prep for Sol because of his entire body.

{{champion:69}} {{champion:56}}  could use the same.

Maybe even stuff like {{champion:91}} 's cloak could get the same treatment.

> [{quoted}](name=FantasySniper,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lB21gEcM,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-08-18T12:11:18.266+0000)
>

> Maybe even stuff like {{champion:91}} 's cloak could get the same treatment.

Cassiopeia wouldn't use this physics rigging update because she doesn't have any free flowing aspects that it would operate with. Ahri had her tails while in movement, Lissandra had her ponytail, and Aurelion had his free floating body. A snake, like Cassiopeia's lower half, does not free flow and does not operate with drag-along physics - the entire snake has to be slithering in order to properly move. Her movement animations are actually pretty decent, and if she needs anything, it's a base skin recall animation.
Do you know how a snake's turning works? It doesn't work like Cass'. When she turns, the whole tail moves with her in an instant instead of dragging like Sol's.

> [{quoted}](name=FantasySniper,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lB21gEcM,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-08-18T13:17:29.167+0000)
>
> Do you know how a snake's turning works? It doesn't work like Cass'. When she turns, the whole tail moves with her in an instant instead of dragging like Sol's.

That's true, but Sol's tail is free floating, and having no ground contact. Having her tail act like Sol's is physically unfeasible because her lower half still has to actually exert force to propel her, where as Sol's lower half I'd simply drug along by the top.
It's physically unfeasible to move your tail in the same position relative to your body while you're on the ground, but not when you're in the air?
What im hoping for is that Cass' movent mimics that of Dota 2 Medusa... just wishful thinking :3

Agreed, Sona could use this. 

... im not biased.... nope

Of course not. ;D
I agree though.

I'd absolutely love to see some more visual updates of Janna and Sona. 

But there are actually over 75 champions in need of Visual, Voiceover or Gameplay updates, even more than Janna and Sona.
Ahri is the only old champion that got this because she is special and her players would probably have a heart attack otherwise.
